content: whip up an adorable seal in under an hour with this no-sew crochet seal pattern this quick and easy amigurumi seal plush has all of the cuteness and none of the sewing it would make a great addition to your next market/craft fair or a fun gift for a seal lover the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog materials * super bulky yarn * 4 5mm crochet hook * 6mm safety eyes * 4 ply yarn in black or black embroidery floss * polyester fiberfill * stitch marker yarn needle scissors the finished item measure approximately 3 8cm long item size may vary depending on gauge and materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/crochet-seal-pattern/
